original_text: When he does his work in the north, I do not see him. When he moves to the south, I still cannot find him anywhere. When he does his work in the north,
korean_text: 그가 왼쪽에서 일하시나 내가 만날 수 없고 그가 오른쪽으로 돌이키시나 뵈올 수 없구나

sentences.original_text: When he does his work in the north
When he moves to the south
I still cannot find him anywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여전히 어디서도 그를 찾을 수 없다

sentences.original_text: When he does his work in the north
